summary: I HAVE A DOOR LATCH PROBLEM.  LOOKED IT UP AND FOUND THAT IN SEP 2016 A SAFTEY RECALL WAS PUT OUT BY FORD FOR THE DOOR LATCHES FOR 2013 - 2015 FORD ESCAPES.  I TRIED TO EXPLAIN THIS TO THE DEALERSHIP SERVICE CENTER AND THEY DO NOT HAVE THIS RECALL LISTED. I HAVE THIS PROBLEM AND I NEED IT FIXED.
